detail.content: Study Abroad: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        Special Programs What Is Special Programs? Study Abroad Summer High School Summer in New York City Programs for Visiting Students Open Arts Minors Blog Events Newsletters Videos Admin & Faculty Alumni Contact Us  home > Special Programs > Study Abroad        Study Abroad   Follow Us:          Tweet      Tisch Study Abroad programs offer specialized, advanced-level training in a variety of arts disciplines and meet the same standards of excellence as our programs in New York. Beyond the classroom, student activities include field trips, performances, and interaction with professional artists.     Academic Year: BERLIN, GERMANY • Stanislavsky, Brecht and Beyond: An Integrated Approach to Actor Training  HAVANA, CUBA • Documentary Video Production in Havana • Photography: On Location in Havana LONDON, ENGLAND   • Shakespeare in Performance at RADA • Playwriting in London • Screenwriting in London PRAGUE, CZECH REPUBLIC   • 35mm Directing in Prague SYDNEY, AUSTRALIA • Producing and Screenwriting in Sydney           Summer:    AMSTERDAM, THE NETHERLANDS   • International Theatre Workshop in Amsterdam BERLIN, GERMANY   • Multimedia Projects Workshop FLORENCE, ITALY   • Commedia dell’Arte in Florence • Writing in Florence  HAVANA, CUBA   • Dance and Culture in Havana   • Photography: On Location in Havana LONDON, ENGLAND   • Producing in London • Introduction to Television Writing PARIS, FRANCE   • Experimental Production Workshop PRAGUE, CZECH REPUBLIC   • 35mm Filmmaking in Prague • Contemporary Design: Prague Quadrennial Festival                             Request Information 2015-16 Tisch Special Programs Admissions Calendar Scholarships and Financial Aid for Study Abroad Study Abroad Alumni Quote Book Subscribe to the Tisch Special Programs Blog Tisch Representation: Global Network University  Study Abroad Brochure (pdf)  Fall/Spring Study Abroad Programs FAQ Summer Study Abroad Programs FAQ  Office of Special Programs 721 Broadway, 12th Floor New York, NY 10003  Contact us!
